plot: A young girl, haunted by a strange voice, struggles to escape her other, mysterious self. To deal with this secret, she must deal with her past, her fears and herself.
title: Ears of Cherry
plot_es: A young girl, haunted by a strange voice, struggles to escape her other, mysterious self. To deal with this secret, she must deal with her past, her fears and herself.
